measured_by: Screen for Child Anxiety Related Emotional Disorders (SCARED)
justification: "Participants were recruited to capture the full spectrum of anxiety symptom severity as measured by the Screen for Child Anxiety and Related Emotional Disorders (SCARED)."

measured_by: Anxiety and Related Disorders Interview Schedule-IV (ADIS-IV)
justification: "Participants completed the Anxiety and Related Disorders Interview Schedule-IV (ADIS-IV) with a clinician trained to criterion."

measured_by: Driving Game (adapted Stoplight Task) – frequency of risky choices
justification: "Here, we measured anxiety, risk-taking, and response inhibition in 137 adolescents … as they played the Driving Game, a decision-making task," which records the number of risky choices at yellow lights.

measured_by: Driving Game (adapted Stoplight Task) – successful inhibitions/false alarms at red lights
justification: "Participants were instructed to … stop when the light turns red, thereby measuring response inhibition (stopping a prepotent response when the light turns red)."
